page.title: 21Bredbury and Woodley updated.
page.content: This area is well served by public transport. There is still a 10 minute bus service, the 330, from Stockport via Bredbury, Woodley and Hyde to Ashton. Local buses on routes 383 and 384 run from Stockport to Marple via Bredbury and Romiley. Rail services in this area are also good, from Sheffield or New Mills to Manchester via Romiley and Bredbury, and Bredbury station was heavily refurbished in 2009.
